Package edu.ucr.cs.pyneapple.utils.PRUCUtils

package edu.ucr.cs.pyneapple.utils.PRUCUtils
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Area
    This class describes the Area class which is a spatial area that has numerical attribute and represented by a set of marginal coordinates
    EnclavesAssignment
    This class corresponds to Section 5.1.3 Enclaves Assignment In detail, Enclaves Assignment assigns all the unassigned areas left from the Region Growth Phase using a greedy method
    GlobalSearch
    This class corresponds to the Section 5.1 Global Search
    IndirectFlowPush
    This class corresponds to the Indirect Flow Push in Section 5.1.5
    InterregionUpdate
    This class corresponds to Section 5.1.4 Inter-region Update
    LocalOptimization
    This class corresponds to Section 5.2 Local Optimization
    Move
    This class implements the basic operation of moving an area from a region to another region
    Preprocess
    This class preprocess the data by reading the data from the shapefile, creating the area class and build the neighboring relations
    Region
    This class describes the Region that is composed of a set of areas
    RegionGrowth
    This class corresponds to Section 5.1.2 Region Growth
    Seed
    This prerequisite datastructure for Seed Identification
    SeedIdentification
    This class corresponds to Section 5.1.1 Seed Identification
    Tarjan
    This class is proposed to speed up the process of locating all the articulation areas of a given region
